original_text: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.
korean_text: 내가 날마다 너희와 함께 성전에 있을 때에 내게 손을 대지 아니하였도다 그러나 이제는 너희 때요 어둠의 권세로다 하시더라

sentences.original_text: When I was daily with you in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 날마다 성전에서 너희와 함께 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: ye stretched forth no hands against me
